overview: Computer Scientist with 7+ years of experience in Software Engineering. Most of that time spent as a professional Java/J2EE developer, but more recently with the Python Django framework. Avid practitioner and advocate for the Agile software development process. Strong experience with Web 2.0 and Relational Database technologies. In depth knowledge of Data Mining techniques including Natural Language Processing and Machine Learning.

degrees.subject: Computer Science
degrees.institution: The University of Texas at Austin
